author: cnbc.com
title: BlackRock Capital Investment Corporation to Report Fourth Quarter 2017 Earnings on March 7, 2018
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- BlackRock Capital Investment Corporation (NASDAQ:BKCC) ("BlackRock Capital Investment" or the "Company") announced today that it will report earnings for the fourth quarter 2017 on Wednesday, March 7, 2018 after the close of the financial markets.
BlackRock Capital Investment invites all interested persons to attend its webcast/teleconference at 10:00 a.m. (Eastern Time) on Thursday, March 8, 2018 to discuss its fourth quarter 2017 financial results. The Company's fourth quarter earnings release will be available in the investor relations section of its website, www.blackrockbkcc.com .
Members of the public who are interested in participating in the teleconference should dial, from the United States, (888) 300-2343, or from outside the United States, (719) 325-4770, shortly before 10:00 a.m. on Thursday, March 8, 2018 and reference the BlackRock Capital Investment Conference Call (ID Number 8472973). A live, listen-only webcast will also be available via the investor relations section of www.blackrockbkcc.com .
Both the teleconference and webcast will be available for replay by 1:00 p.m. on Thursday, March 8, 2018 and ending at 1:00 p.m. on Thursday, March 22, 2018. To access the replay of the teleconference, callers from the United States should dial (888) 203-1112 and callers from outside the United States should dial (719) 457-0820 and enter the Conference ID Number 8472973. To access the webcast, please visit the investor relations section of www.blackrockbkcc.com .
About BlackRock Capital Investment Corporation
Formed in 2005, BlackRock Capital Investment Corporation is a business development company that provides debt and equity capital to middle-market companies.
Available Information
BlackRock Capital Investment Corporationâ€™s filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission, press releases, earnings releases and other financial information are available on its website at www.blackrockbkcc.com .
